attributes.action: Child maintenance service to issue yearly statements with a full breakdown
attributes.additional_details: This is an account that is very hard to get factual information from, we have to justify why we want to see this information and to check the year on totals are correct and calculations are correct
attributes.background: The child maintenance service to issue a full yearly statement with full breakdown of payments, debts and the figure used to calculate the payment amount for that year

rejection.details:
The Child Maintenance Service already provides an annual statement with details of child maintenance payments, which appears to cover all of the information set out in your petition: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/child-maintenance-a-guide-to-statements-for-receiving-and-paying-parents/understanding-your-child-maintenance-statement-a-guide-for-paying-parents

If you would like the Government to change the information provided in these statements you could start a new petition stating clearly what changes you want to be made to these statements.
